properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) count FROM FAQ WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNO, A.* FROM ( SELECT FAQ_NO , NICKNAME , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') "CREATE_DATE" , F_CATEGORY_CODE FROM FAQ F JOIN MEMBER ON(FAQ_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE F.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC ) A ) WHERE RNO BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT FAQ_NO , NICKNAME , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , TO_CHAR(CREATE_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI:SS') "CREATE_DATE" , F_CATEGORY_CODE FROM FAQ JOIN MEMBER ON (FAQ_WRITER = MEM_NO) WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
INSERT INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , FAQ_WRITER , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , F_CATEGORY_CODE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FAQNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_TITLE = ? , FAQ_CONTENT = ? , F_CATEGORY_CODE = ? WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET STATUS = 'N' WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT , F_CATEGORY_CODE FROM FAQ WHERE F_CATEGORY_CODE = ? ORDER BY FAQ_NO DESC

SELECT COUNT(*) "count" FROM PRODUCT WHERE FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'))) >= 0 AND SOLDOUT = 'N' AND TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' OR REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' OR AREA LIKE '%'||?||'%'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A.* FROM ( SELECT PNO , TITLE , REGION , AGE , AREA , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') S_DATE , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(E_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'), 'RRRR.MM.DD') E_DATE , TIME , MAIN_IMG , DETAIL_IMG , ETC FROM PRODUCT WHERE FLOOR(MONTHS_BETWEEN(SYSDATE, TO_DATE(S_DATE, 'RRRRMMDD'))) >= 0 AND SOLDOUT = 'N' AND TITLE LIKE '%'||?||'%' OR REGION LIKE '%'||?||'%' OR AREA LIKE '%'||?||'%' ORDER BY 1 DESC ) A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
